articles.title: List of winners in the 2017 UISAPA contest
articles.description: SALT LAKE CITY (AP) — The Deseret News in Utah and the Times-News and Moscow-Pullman Daily News in Idaho were named the winners Friday in the general excellence category of the Utah Idaho Spokane Associated Press Association's news contest.
